description:
The world can be healed through music, and these three girls want to make it happen. Meet Kana Fujii, Reimi Itsushiro, and Hibiki Morishima—three healers-in-training at the Karasuma Phoniatric Clinic learning the art of healing patients’ illnesses and injuries by singing. Join them on this musical adventure of kindhearted, powerful miracles sung to heal the world.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/132219566) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/user/IRICOMIX)

Affiliated with [Studio 3Hz](https://anilist.co/studio/6069/). One of the key members of JAniCA.

__[Profile (Lantis)](https://www.lantis.jp/artist/Void_Chords/bio.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RyoTakahashi111)__

__Ryo Takashi__, alternatively known as Void_Chords, is a Japanese composer, arranger, music producer, bassist and DJ. He also works with the doujin group FELT under the alias Maurits "ZEN" Cornelis.
_Note: Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/212266/)._

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/東潤一)

Founder and representative director of Studio Easter.
